sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
        <v-navigation-drawer
                v-model="drawer"
                app
                clipped
                color="light-green lighten-5"
        >
            <v-list dense>
                <v-list-item v-for="menu in menus" :key="menu.title" :to="menu.link">
                    <v-list-item-content>
                        <v-list-item-title>{{menu.title}}</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>

                </v-list-item>
                <v-list-item>
                    <b-nav-form @submit.prevent="logout" v-if="token !== null">
                        <b-button type="submit" size="sm" class="my-2 ml-2"> Logout</b-button>
                    </b-nav-form>

                </v-list-item>

            </v-list>
        </v-navigation-drawer>

        <v-app-bar
                app
                clipped-left
                color="green"
        >
            <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click.stop="drawer = !drawer"/>
            <v-toolbar-title>KP-OP</v-toolbar-title>
        </v-app-bar>

        <v-content class="ma-3">

            <router-view></router-view>


        </v-content>

        <v-footer app>

        </v-footer>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script>
    import {TokenService} from "./storage/service";
    export default {
        name: "app",
        components: {},
        data: () => ({
            drawer: null,
            menus: [{title: 'gpu', link: '/gpu'},
                {title: 'about', link: '/about'}],
            token: localStorage.getItem('user-token') || null,
        }),
        created() {
            this.$vuetify.theme.light
            this.token = TokenService.getToken() || null;
        },
        logout() {
            localStorage.removeItem('user-token');
            this.token = null;
        },
    }
</script>
